name: Bug Bovver!
overview: In this game, you play a boot. Your goal is to squash as many "bugs" as possible within 2 minutes. This is a one key game. You only need to press the return (enter on modern computers) to squash the little critters. This game was developed by Terry P. Barrett and Steve W. Colwill and published as a type-in game in the book "Winning Games on the Commodore 64 in 1984.
